description: Keep curious fingers off your TouchPad? This app will help you to keep people from messing with your device by throwing out sparks any time someone tries to pick it up. Leave your TouchPad with this app turned on and just watch from a distance. Or, you can turn on "Do not touch!" and hand your device to your friend for a nice prank. Make sure to turn the sound on loud! There are two modes: (1) Entire screen is energized (try multi-touch as well) (2) Screen seems locked, when trying to unlock, user gets energized *** More on www.hausteinapps.com
